desc: I am looking for someone to help me create an 8 bit music video for an original song. The project is a passion project of my friends and I, "Squid Biologist". Squid Biologist is a band about a group of squids squidding through the sea. They meet many characters such as The Frizz, Spermy the sperm whale (squids' worst enemy), and the god like figure Steve O' Shea, a real life squid biologist that spreads the good word of squids, but also captures and dissects them for knowledge.The song I want animated is called "Kavorka" and can be heard here in its original form, [url removed, login to view] The lyrics tell a story about a character named "The Frizz", a squidette with very frizzy hair that all the squids have an attraction to because she has "The Kavorka", or the lure of the animal (think the Seinfeld episode).Anyways I made an 8 bit version of the song that I imagine a very fun and simple 8 bit animated music video to go along with it. I imagine the video following the story the lyrics tell, with simple animations of a squad of 4 squids undulating around, dancing, and seeing the Frizz and her frizzy hair, maybe passing by Spermy the sperm whale or Steve O Shea somewhere in there. The squids represent us, the band members, and I imagine most of the video being the squids "walking" around, dancing, and singing. What I really want though is for someone to have fun with it. This is a ridiculous project, we only sing about a group of squids and their adventures, it is meant to spread fun. I really hope to find someone that wants to have some fun creating a true original video. I can send the 8 bit version of the song once we connect. I gotta squidaddle, thanks.
title: 8 bit music video

desc: We have the story - we need to illustrate it in a compelling and interesting way. This project will be a portfolio leader, and will have wide commercial exposure.We are seeking an ambitious 3D designer(s) who can partner with us in illustrating a series of biological and organic-oriented infographics for use across all our marketing channels. Familiarity or formal education in biology, microbiology and/or agronomics is a bonus as we are looking to show how our products make a real difference in organic plant growth.Assist us in the creation of 3d models of primary components of organic elements for use in packaging, literature and eventually video shorts. This includes the creation of the models with detailed textures, different views of models, the combination of several elements to show what and how our products work in growing roots systems, stems and leaves of several plant varieties. We will show how our products positively impact soil health, and the microbiology, as well as how we can help grow better and bigger fruits and blooms.Varieties of plants will include turf-grass, cannabis, trees, vegetables (tomatoes), grains, flowers, and fruits.- Native English speaker is a must- Long-term project potential- All creative assets and rights turned over at conclusion of project segments, prior to final payment installment
title: Need 3D illustrations of plants, soil, biology, static renderings, later, animated

desc: We are an Explainer Video company, and looking to expand our team. We want animators who can create Explainer Videos, and looking to hire them on project basis.We already have a team in place, but due to the extra work, need 2-3 animators who can work with us on freelance basis as and when needed. As we already have in-house animators, the key for us is price and quality of work. We do not want to spend a lot, as we already have a team, so anyone who is able to show a quality portfolio with the most reasonable rates will get hired.This will be ongoing work, so whoever we go with can expect a lot of consistent work and income coming for them. Anyone who is able to do 2D Explainer videos, custom and with a toolkit, motion graphics, vector animations, cartoon and character, is most welcome to apply.The kind of quality we are looking for is this:[url removed, login to view]As well as character animations of this quality:[url removed, login to view]Please give your quote on a per minute basis. And do not bid over the budget we have set, as those bids would be removed immediately. Also write 'Vidzio' in your opening sentence of your proposal so we know you have read the project details. It is very important that you send some Explainer Video samples that you have done so we have an idea of your quality of work.Looking forward to welcoming some fine animators to our team! Thank you.
title: Multiple Animators Required for Explainer Videos
